name: Fast Foods
description:
Too New, Didn't Finish; The goal of the game is to drive around picking up supplies for home base and then blowing up your remotely driven car to stop the endless waves of zombies. The entire time driving over exploding zombies. Game ends when all spawners are destroyed.

This is an unfinished Unity Project. Meaning it only works through the Unity Creator and it's reaaaallly not finished. You can drive around and run over some zombies that make explodey particles though!

Explosion VFX and Zombie Characters are from  https://craftpix.net/freebies/
